fullText: Condola Rashad brings fierce intelligence and blazing conviction to her portrayal of the teenage peasant who heard voices from God and liberated France from English rule.
dtliExcerpt: Condola Rashad brings fierce intelligence and blazing conviction to her portrayal of the teenage peasant who heard voices from God and liberated France from English rule.
